Job Title: Associate Application Developer

Location: Stamford, CT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
The Associate Application Developer will build fundamental products and features that directly impact the consumer experience. The role will create innovative solutions by developing and implementing applications.

Actively and consistently support all efforts to simplify and enhance the consumer experience. Design, implement, and deliver fundamental products for users. Actively and independently acquire knowledge of new development technologies in areas such as mobile, video, second screen, social media and other niches. Work closely with the development team to respond, clarify or define specific application behavior, look/feel and function. Diagnose fundamental issues, evaluate and execute the best resolution. Manage detailed application requirements and collaborate with project and development teams to ensure quality function, features and user experience. Assist in the modification, enhancement and implementation of software systems designed to support new or existing business initiatives. Test software to ensure proper and efficient execution and adherence to business and technical requirements. Write code that meets the production requirements and design specifications. Ensure code is regression free, documented and unit tested. Participate in design and wireframe review to provide a technical perspective on implementation.

Required Skills/Abilities And Knowledge

Ability to read, write, speak and understand EnglishBasic foundation in data structures, algorithms, and OO DesignBasic understanding of Objective-C, iOS SDKs, XCode, and related development technologiesBasic understanding of best practices in mobile UX designBasic knowledge of Agile development methodologiesAbility to deliver against several initiatives simultaneouslyAbility to prioritize and organize effectively Effective written and verbal communication skillsDemonstrated in-depth analytical and troubleshooting abilities

Required Education

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related fieldRequired Related Work Experience and Number of YearsAndroid/iOS application development experience - 1-2Software development experience - 1-2

Working Conditions

Office environment
